<script id="loadcss">
!function(modules){function __webpack_require__(moduleId){if(installedModules[moduleId])return installedModules[moduleId].exports;var module=installedModules[moduleId]={exports:{},id:moduleId,loaded:!1};return modules[moduleId].call(module.exports,module,module.exports,__webpack_require__),module.loaded=!0,module.exports}var installedModules={};return __webpack_require__.m=modules,__webpack_require__.c=installedModules,__webpack_require__.p="/scripts/",__webpack_require__(0)}({0:function(module,exports,__webpack_require__){function cssLoader(){cookie("fullcss",!1);var stylesheet;stylesheet=isDev?loadCSS("/styles/screen.css",document.getElementById("loadcss")):loadCSS("/styles/screen."+document.getElementById("fullCSS-meta").getAttribute("data-hash")+".css",document.getElementById("loadcss")),stylesheet.setAttribute("onload","javascript:window.fullCSSLoaded=true;"),cookie("fullcss","true",30)}var loadCSS=__webpack_require__(36),cookie=__webpack_require__(11),enhancejs={};enhancejs.cookie=cookie,enhancejs.loadCSS=loadCSS;var isDev="3000"===window.location.port||"8080"===window.location.port||"8888"===window.location.port;window.fullCSSLoaded=!1,(!document.getElementById("full-CSS")||isDev)&&("Data Visualization"==window.AKAMAI.UTILS.pageType?cssLoader():window.addEventListener("load",cssLoader)),enhancejs.isDev=isDev,window.enhance=enhancejs},11:function(module,exports,__webpack_require__){(function(global){(function(){/*! cookie function. get, set, or forget a cookie. [c]2014 @scottjehl, Filament Group, Inc. Licensed MIT */
!function(w){var cookie=function(name,value,days){if(void 0===value){var cookiestring="; "+w.document.cookie,cookies=cookiestring.split("; "+name+"=");return 2===cookies.length?cookies.pop().split(";").shift():null}value===!1&&(days=-1);var expires="";if(days){var date=new Date;date.setTime(date.getTime()+24*days*60*60*1e3),expires="; expires="+date.toGMTString()}w.document.cookie=name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/"};module.exports=cookie}("undefined"!=typeof global?global:this)}).call(window)}).call(exports,function(){return this}())},12:function(module,exports){module.exports=function(src){"function"==typeof execScript?execScript(src):eval.call(null,src)}},36:function(module,exports,__webpack_require__){__webpack_require__(12)(__webpack_require__(59)),module.exports=loadCSS},59:function(module,exports){module.exports='/*!\nloadCSS: load a CSS file asynchronously.\n[c]2015 @scottjehl, Filament Group, Inc.\nLicensed MIT\n*/\n(function(w){\n	"use strict";\n	/* exported loadCSS */\n	var loadCSS = function( href, before, media ){\n		// Arguments explained:\n		// `href` [REQUIRED] is the URL for your CSS file.\n		// `before` [OPTIONAL] is the element the script should use as a reference for injecting our stylesheet <link> before\n			// By default, loadCSS attempts to inject the link after the last stylesheet or script in the DOM. However, you might desire a more specific location in your document.\n		// `media` [OPTIONAL] is the media type or query of the stylesheet. By default it will be \'all\'\n		var doc = w.document;\n		var ss = doc.createElement( "link" );\n		var ref;\n		if( before ){\n			ref = before;\n		}\n		else {\n			var refs = ( doc.body || doc.getElementsByTagName( "head" )[ 0 ] ).childNodes;\n			ref = refs[ refs.length - 1];\n		}\n\n		var sheets = doc.styleSheets;\n		ss.rel = "stylesheet";\n		ss.href = href;\n		// temporarily set media to something inapplicable to ensure it\'ll fetch without blocking render\n		ss.media = "only x";\n\n		// Inject link\n			// Note: the ternary preserves the existing behavior of "before" argument, but we could choose to change the argument to "after" in a later release and standardize on ref.nextSibling for all refs\n			// Note: `insertBefore` is used instead of `appendChild`, for safety re: http://www.paulirish.com/2011/surefire-dom-element-insertion/\n		ref.parentNode.insertBefore( ss, ( before ? ref : ref.nextSibling ) );\n		// A method (exposed on return object for external use) that mimics onload by polling until document.styleSheets until it includes the new sheet.\n		var onloadcssdefined = function( cb ){\n			var resolvedHref = ss.href;\n			var i = sheets.length;\n			while( i-- ){\n				if( sheets[ i ].href === resolvedHref ){\n					return cb();\n				}\n			}\n			setTimeout(function() {\n				onloadcssdefined( cb );\n			});\n		};\n\n		// once loaded, set link\'s media back to `all` so that the stylesheet applies once it loads\n		ss.onloadcssdefined = onloadcssdefined;\n		onloadcssdefined(function() {\n			ss.media = media || "all";\n		});\n		return ss;\n	};\n	// commonjs\n	if( typeof module !== "undefined" ){\n		module.exports = loadCSS;\n	}\n	else {\n		w.loadCSS = loadCSS;\n	}\n}( typeof global !== "undefined" ? global : this ));\n\n'}});
</script>

<label class="tab__label nav-tabs" for="levelitem33">Intelligent Platform</label>

<div class="nav-components">
<div class="span_3 navigation--col nav-products">
<ul class="ul-left">

<a href="/us/en/solutions/intelligent-platform/visualizing-akamai/network-performance-comparison.jsp" target="" class="nav-items">Network Performance Comparison</a> </li>
<li>
<a href="/us/en/solutions/intelligent-platform/visualizing-akamai/network-operations-command-center.jsp" target="" class="nav-items">Network Operations Command Center</a> </li> </ul> </div>
<div class="span_3 navigation--col nav-products">
<ul class="ul-left">
<li>
<a href="/us/en/about/our-thinking/state-of-the-internet-report/web-attack-visualization.jsp" target="" class="nav-items">Web Attack Visualization</a> </li>

</li>
<li>
<a href="/us/en/solutions/intelligent-platform/visualizing-akamai/real-time-web-monitor.jsp" target="" class="nav-items">Real-Time Web Monitor</a> </li> </ul> </div>

<ul class="ul-left">

</div>
</div>
</div>
</li> 
</ul>
</div>
<div class="nav-content--4">
<div class="background-bar"></div>
<ul class="tabs primary-nav__level-two tabs__tab-length--5" >
<li class="tabs__single-tab tab tab--1">
<input type="radio" name="item4" class="tab__radio" id="levelitem41" checked/>

<div class="tab__content">
<div class="inner-wrapper">
<div class="nav-components">
<div class="span_6 navigation--col nav-products two-col-category">
<h4>Products</h4>
<ul class="ul-left">
<li>

<div class="page-wrapper--inner scene_element scene_element--fadein" id="page-wrapper">
<main role="main">
<div data-swiftype-name="body" data-swiftype-type="text">
<div class="campaign-page" data-module="GlobalCampaignIntro[]">
<header class="hero-intro-region hero-intro" data-ui-component="hero-intro">
<span class="hero-intro__banner repeat" style="background-image: url('/us/en/multimedia/images/introbackground/dot-pattern-photo-overlay.png'); opacity:0.7; z-index:9;"></span>
<div class="focal-point right-5 up-6 responsive-background responsive-background--full-width">
<style>#picid246c806b5e9e4f6795e69fd70a65ad63 {padding-bottom: 80.01%;}.IMTest{display:none;}@media (max-width: 480px) {#picid246c806b5e9e4f6795e69fd70a65ad63 {padding-bottom: ;}}</style><div class="img-wrapper introImage" id="picid246c806b5e9e4f6795e69fd70a65ad63" style="background-color: #545968; "><img src="/us/en/multimedia/images/intro/akamai-cloud-security-intro-v2-1366x1093.jpg?imwidth=1366" tagid="" alt="Akamai Cloud Security" srcset="/us/en/multimedia/images/intro/akamai-cloud-security-intro-v2-1366x1093.jpg?imwidth=320 320w,/us/en/multimedia/images/intro/akamai-cloud-security-intro-v2-1366x1093.jpg?imwidth=720 720w,/us/en/multimedia/images/intro/akamai-cloud-security-intro-v2-1366x1093.jpg?imwidth=1366 1366w" sizes="(min-width: 800px) 62vw, 100vw"/></div>
</div>
</header>
<div class="outer-wrapper"><div class="inner-wrapper">
<div class="span_8 hero-intro intro-region">
<span style="background-color:#0099CC; opacity:0.7;" class="hero-intro__banner-color regular"> </span>
<div class="region__inner">
<h4 class="hero-intro__title intro--label introLabel"> 
Cloud Security 
</h4>
<h1 class="hero-intro__title introTitle" itemprop="name"> 
Security Threat Intelligence 
</h1>
<p class="hero-intro__tagline introTeaser-0"> 
Security that evolves faster than your attackers.
<br />
<br />
“You need your security in the cloud and your defenses to be out where the attackers are.”
<br />
- Tom Leighton 
</p>
<p class="introBody-0"> 
Users expect the online experience to be always available and always secure — and for their personal and business assets to be safe. As more data and business processes move online, organizations are challenged to protect <a href="/us/en/resources/cloud-computing-infrastructure.jsp" title="Cloud Computing Infrastructure Intro" >websites and infrastructure</a> without sacrificing performance for security. Akamai brings content close to users by extending the security perimeter to the cloud to help protect against increasingly sophisticated web and <a href="/us/en/resources/cyber-attacks.jsp" title="Cyber Attacks" >data center attacks</a>. 
</p>
<a href="/us/en/products/cloud-security/" target="_self" data-icon="chevron-right" data-iconpos="right" class="introCTA button button--white hp-heading--eta button--orangegradient" >Learn About Cloud Security Products</a> 
</div>
</div> 
<aside class="span_4 sidebar-region">
<div class="region__inner">
<div class="sidebarCallout-0">
<section class=" clearfix" data-ui-component=""> 
<a href="/us/en/solutions/why-akamai/ddos-and-application-protection.jsp" target="_self"><div class="callout__img">
<div class="fixed-ratio">
<style>#picide443d1bcb4de423184913ed608792a97 {padding-bottom: 56.22%;}.IMTest{display:none;}@media (max-width: 480px) {#picide443d1bcb4de423184913ed608792a97 {padding-bottom: ;}}</style><div class="img-wrapper calloutImage" id="picide443d1bcb4de423184913ed608792a97" style="background-color: #143F4B; "><img src="/us/en/multimedia/images/callout/akamai-cloud-security-ddos-application-protection.jpg?imwidth=720" tagid="" alt="Akamai Cloud Security DDOS Application Protection" srcset="/us/en/multimedia/images/callout/akamai-cloud-security-ddos-application-protection.jpg?imwidth=320 320w,/us/en/multimedia/images/callout/akamai-cloud-security-ddos-application-protection.jpg?imwidth=720 720w" sizes="(min-width: 800px) 62vw, 100vw"/></div>
</div>
</div>
<h2 class="heading--large calloutTitle">
DDoS and Application Protection 
</h2>
<p> 
Protect yourself and your business from common and sophisticated attacks by getting ahead of the changing threat landscape and be better prepared for emerging attack vectors. 
</p></a> 
</section> </div>
<div class="sidebarCallout-1">
<section class=" clearfix" data-ui-component=""> 
<a href="https://content.akamai.com/us-en-pg9554-gartner-magic-quadrant.html" target="_blank">
<div class="callout__img">
<div class="fixed-ratio">
<style>#picidff12f26cdd4141ec9350d2e04c08b992 {padding-bottom: 56.25%;}.IMTest{display:none;}@media (max-width: 480px) {#picidff12f26cdd4141ec9350d2e04c08b992 {padding-bottom: ;}}</style><div class="img-wrapper calloutImage" id="picidff12f26cdd4141ec9350d2e04c08b992" style="background-color: transparent; "><img src="/us/en/multimedia/images/callout/akamai-gartner-magic-quadrant-callout.jpg?imwidth=720" tagid="" alt="Gartner Magic Quadrant for WAF" srcset="/us/en/multimedia/images/callout/akamai-gartner-magic-quadrant-callout.jpg?imwidth=320 320w,/us/en/multimedia/images/callout/akamai-gartner-magic-quadrant-callout.jpg?imwidth=720 720w" sizes="(min-width: 800px) 62vw, 100vw"/></div>
</div>
</div>
<h2 class="heading--large calloutTitle">
Gartner Magic Quadrant for Web Application Firewalls 
</h2>
<p> 
Enterprises look to Gartner's Magic Quadrant reports for trustworthy guidance. This market research report can help enterprise security teams evaluate how WAFs can provide improved security that is easy to consume and manage, while respecting data privacy. 
</p>
</a>
</section> </div>
<div class="sidebarCallout-2">
<section class=" clearfix" data-ui-component=""> 
<h2 class="heading--large calloutTitle">
Leading Companies Trust Akamai Cloud Security 
</h2>
<p> 
<ul>
<li>4 of the top US broadcast networks</li>
<li>4 of the top airlines</li>
<li>16 of the top eCommerce companies</li>
<li>100 of the worlds leading banks</li>
<li>The UKs 4 most viewed networks</li>
<li>7 of France’s most viewed networks</li>
<li>6 of Germany’s most viewed networks</li>
<li>The largest US cable and satellite companies</li>
</ul> 
</p>
</section> </div>
</div>
</aside>
<article class="span_8 main-region">
<div class="region__inner">
<ul class="ui-list">
<li class="ui-list__item">
<div class="media">
<div class="media__body">
<p class="media__teaser">
<strong> 
The Buyer’s Guide to Cloud Security 
</strong>
<br />
This guide provides the background and metrics to match a security solution to your needs and outlines what you need to know to make the best decision. 
</p>
<a href="https://content.akamai.com/PG7625-ebook-why-cloud-the-buyers-guide-to-cloud-security.html" target="_blank" data-position="right" data-icon="chevron-right"data-position="right" data-icon="chevron-right">
Learn More </a>
</div>
</div>
</li>
<li class="ui-list__item">
<div class="media">
<div class="media__body">
<p class="media__teaser">
<strong> 
How Do You Measure Protection in the Cloud? 
</strong>
<br />
When choosing a cloud security solution, it can be challenging comparing capacity, response time, and support. Our infographic explains which numbers matter, and what questions you should be asking. 
</p>
<a href="/us/en/multimedia/documents/infographic/akamai-why-cloud-how-do-you-measure-protection-infographic.pdf" target="_blank" data-position="right" data-icon="chevron-right">View the Infographic</a> 
</div>
</div>
</li>
</ul>
<h2 class="heading--underline section-heading"> 
Threat Intelligence Learning Center 
</h2>
<ul class="ui-list">
<li class="ui-list__item">
<div class="media">
<div class="media__body">
<p class="media__teaser">
<strong> 
Latest Threat Advisories 
</strong>
<br />
Akamai's cybersecurity experts conduct research, digital forensics and post-event analysis on every major threat vector. These reports can help your organization make more informed, proactive decisions. 
</p>
<a href="/us/en/about/our-thinking/threat-advisories/" target="_self" data-position="right" data-icon="chevron-right">Learn More</a> 
</div>
</div>
</li>
<li class="ui-list__item">
<div class="media">
<div class="media__body">
<p class="media__teaser">
<strong> 
Security Commentary and Blog 
</strong>
<br />
Akamai’s security experts research and report on the latest threat vectors and methods for mitigating them. Stay abreast of latest security threats with our security advisories, podcasts and blog posts. 
</p>
<a href="/us/en/about/our-thinking/information-security/" target="_self" data-position="right" data-icon="chevron-right">Learn More</a> 
</div>
</div>
</li>
<li class="ui-list__item">
<div class="media">
<div class="media__body">
<p class="media__teaser">
<strong> 
State of the Internet Security 
</strong>
<br />
Get the latest report on DDoS attack trends including origins, tactics, types, targets, and hot-topic security issues. 
</p>
<a href="/us/en/about/our-thinking/state-of-the-internet-report/global-state-of-the-internet-security-ddos-attack-reports.jsp" target="_self" data-position="right" data-icon="chevron-right">Learn More</a> 
</div>
</div>
</li>
</ul>
<h2 class="heading--underline section-heading"> 
Akamai Security Solutions 
</h2>
<ul class="ui-list">
<li class="ui-list__item">
<div class="media">
<div class="media__body">
<p class="media__teaser">
<strong> 
Brochure: Cloud Security Solutions 
</strong>
<br />
Akamai's reputation was earned by building the world's largest cloud-enabled delivery platform, backed by the most scalable, distributed security solution available. Learn more about Akamai's Cloud Security Services and how they can protect your business from the increasing risk of cyber attacks. 
</p>
<a href="/us/en/multimedia/documents/brochure/cloud-security-solutions-brochure.pdf" target="_blank" data-position="right" data-icon="chevron-right">Download the Brochure</a> 
</div>
</div>
</li>
<li class="ui-list__item">
<div class="media">
<div class="media__body">
<p class="media__teaser">
<strong> 
Cloud Security Products 
</strong>
<br />
Akamai’s security products can safeguard your websites and other Internet-facing applications from the risks of downtime and data theft by extending the security perimeter to the edge of the network, protecting from increasing frequency, scale and sophistication of web and <a href="/us/en/resources/cyber-attacks.jsp" target="_self" title="Cyber Attacks" >data center attacks</a>. 
</p>
<a href="/us/en/products/cloud-security/" target="_self" data-position="right" data-icon="chevron-right">Learn More</a> 
</div>
</div>
</li>
</ul><script>
(function(w,d,t,u,n,s,e){w['SwiftypeObject']=n;w[n]=w[n]||function(){
(w[n].q=w[n].q||[]).push(arguments);};s=d.createElement(t);
e=d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0];s.async=1;s.src=u;e.parentNode.insertBefore(s,e);
})(window,document,'script','//s.swiftypecdn.com/install/v2/st.js','_st');

</script> </div>
</article>
</div>
</div>

<div class="span_12">
<div class="global-footer__disclaimer span_12">
<p><small class="italic fine-print"> 
<span style="font-size:0.6rem; line-height:12px;">As the global leader in Content Delivery Network (<a href="/us/en/cdn/" target="_self" title="CDN Learning Center Intro" >CDN</a>) services, Akamai makes the Internet fast, reliable and secure for its customers. The company’s advanced web performance, mobile performance, cloud security and media delivery solutions are revolutionizing how businesses optimize consumer, enterprise and entertainment experiences for any device, anywhere. To learn how Akamai solutions and its team of Internet experts are helping businesses move faster forward, please visit www.akamai.com or <a href="http://blogs.akamai.com/" target="_blank">blogs.akamai.com</a>, and follow @Akamai on <a href="http://www.twitter.com/akamai" target="_blank">Twitter</a>.</span>
</small></p>
</div>

<li>
<a href="#" class="off-canvas-nav__disclosure-detail gtm_Hamburger_Nav"></a>
<a href="/us/en/services-support/" class="gtm_Hamburger_Nav">Services &amp; Support</a>
<ul class="menu">
<li class="fixed-sticky off-canvas-nav__header">
<a href="#" class="button button--gray off-canvas__back-button gtm_Hamburger_Nav" data-icon="arrow-left">Back</a>
<header class="off-canvas-nav__header-text">
Services &amp; Support
</header>
</li>

<a href="/us/en/about/leadership/board-of-directors/directors-naomi-seligman.jsp" class="gtm_Hamburger_Nav">Naomi O. Seligman</a>

<li>

<script>
function loadScript(src, appBuiltJs, defer)
{
var scriptToLoad;
var bodyOfPage;
scriptToLoad = document.createElement('script');
scriptToLoad.type = 'text/javascript';
var loadScriptEvent;
if(appBuiltJs==true){
scriptToLoad.onload=function(){
if (document.createEvent) {
loadScriptEvent = document.createEvent("HTMLEvents");
loadScriptEvent.initEvent("appBuiltJsLoad", true, true);
} 
else{
loadScriptEvent = document.createEventObject();
loadScriptEvent.eventType = "appBuiltJsLoad";
}
loadScriptEvent.eventName = "appBuiltJsLoad";
if (document.createEvent) {
window.dispatchEvent(loadScriptEvent);
} else { 
window.fireEvent("on" + loadScriptEvent.eventType, loadScriptEvent);
}
}
}
scriptToLoad.src = src;
if(defer==true)
scriptToLoad.defer = true;
bodyOfPage = document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0];
bodyOfPage.appendChild(scriptToLoad);
}
loadScript("/scripts/fontloader.built."+document.getElementById("fullCSS-meta").getAttribute("data-hash")+".js", false, true);
window.onload = function() {
loadScript("/scripts/app.built."+document.getElementById("fullCSS-meta").getAttribute("data-hash")+".js", true, true);
};
</script>
<script>
var url=document.location.pathname;
var publication=window.AKAMAI.UTILS.publication;
if(url.indexOf(publication)>=0){
url=url.substring(url.indexOf(publication)+publication.length+1).replace(/\//g,"|");
// url=url.substring(0,url.lastIndexOf('|'));
if(AKAMAI.UTILS.pageType=="Home Page")
url="Home Page";
else if(url.indexOf(".jsp")>=0)
url=url.substring(0,(url.length-4));
else
url+="index";
}
else{
url=url.substring(1).replace(/\//g,"|");
// if(url.indexOf("|")>=0)
// url=url.substring(0,url.lastIndexOf('|'));
if(AKAMAI.UTILS.pageType=="Home Page")
url="Home Page";
else if(url.indexOf(".jsp")>=0)
url=url.substring(0,(url.length-4));
else
url+="index";
}
dataLayer.push(
{'contentType': url},
{'publication': publication}
);
window.addEventListener('jQueryReady', function(){
dataLayer.push(
{'event': 'jQueryReady'}
);
});
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
var addthis_share = {
url_transforms : {shorten: {default: 'bitly'}}, 
shorteners : {bitly : {}}
}
</script><script>
window.addEventListener("load",loadAddthis);
function loadAddthis(){
var addthis_config = addthis_config||{};
//addthis_config.data_track_clickback = false;
addthis_config.data_track_clickback = false;
var script=document.createElement('script');
script.type = 'text/javascript';
script.onload=function(){
if(document.querySelectorAll('meta[property="og:image"]').length>0)
addthis.update("share","media",document.querySelectorAll('meta[property="og:image"]')[0].getAttribute("content"));
};
script.defer=true;
script.src = "//s7.addthis.com/js/300/addthis_widget.js#pubid=ra-54527f043b9dd729";
document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0].appendChild(script);
}
</script><style>
@media screen and (max-width: 1024px) {
.primary-nav__level-one.redesign-2017 .nav__items>label, .primary-nav__level-one.redesign-2017 .nav__items a.services, .primary-nav__level-one.redesign-2017 .nav__items a.primary-nav__item{font-size:14px !important;}
}

.primary-nav__level-one.redesign-2017 .nav__items a.primary-nav__item {
padding: 0 1.5% 0 1.5%;
min-height: 70px;
height: 100%;
-webkit-box-flex: 1;
-webkit-flex: 1;
-ms-flex: 1;
flex: 1;
text-align: center;
color: #fff;
font-size: 16px;
font-weight: 500;
display: -webkit-inline-box;
display: -webkit-inline-flex;
display: -ms-inline-flexbox;
display: inline-flex;
-webkit-box-orient: vertical;
-webkit-box-direction: normal;
-webkit-flex-direction: column;
-ms-flex-direction: column;
flex-direction: column;
-webkit-box-pack: center;
-webkit-justify-content: center;
-ms-flex-pack: center;
justify-content: center;
}

}

.primary-nav__level-one.redesign-2017 .nav__items a.primary-nav__item{display:none;}
}
label.tab__label.tab-2.nav-main.why-akamai{flex: 1.2;}
</style><style>
.auto_carousel.minimal .section_title_wrapper{padding-bottom:5px;}
.auto_carousel.minimal .section_title_wrapper .slider_logo {width: 200px;float: left;transform: translateY(5px);}
.auto_carousel.minimal .section_title_wrapper .button{transform:none}
@media(max-width: 385px){
.auto_carousel.minimal .section_title_wrapper .slider_logo{float:none;margin: 0 auto 15px;}
.auto_carousel.minimal .section_title_wrapper .button{float: none;margin-bottom: 0; display: block;}
}
@media(max-width: 480px){
.auto_carousel.minimal .section_title_wrapper .button{min-width: 100px;}
}
@media(max-width: 800px){
.overview figure.align-right{float: none;width: 100%;margin: 0 auto 10px;}
}
@media(min-width: 800px) and (max-width: 1120px){
.auto_carousel.minimal .section_title_wrapper .slider_logo{float:none;margin: 0 auto 15px;}
.auto_carousel.minimal .section_title_wrapper .button{float: none;margin-bottom: 0; display: block;}
}
@media(min-width: 800px) and (max-width: 1000px){
.auto_carousel.minimal .slide_item .slide_content>div .data_wrapper p.main_text{font-size: 2rem;}
.auto_carousel.minimal .slide_item .slide_content>div .data_wrapper p.sub_text{font-size: 0.7435rem}
}
span.tab-icon.blue_background--circle[data-icon="video-camera"]:before {
left: 52%;
}
span.tab-icon.light_blue--circle[data-icon="media"]:before {
left: 53%;
}
@font-face {
font-family: 'Icomoon';
src: url('/fetch-dv-data/icomoon/1/icomoon.woff2') format('woff2'),
url('/fetch-dv-data/icomoon/1/icomoon.ttf') format('truetype');
}
</style><style>#st-search-input-mainnav{background-color:#fff !important;}</style><script type="text/javascript">
(function(){
if(document.location.search.indexOf("utm")>-1){
var params=document.location.search.substring(1).split("&"),
utmParams="";
for (var i = 0; i < params.length; i++) {
params[i]=params[i].split("=")
if(params[i].length==2 && params[i][0].indexOf("utm")==0){
if(utmParams!="")
utmParams+="&"
utmParams+=params[i][0]+"="+params[i][1]; 
}
}
if(window.sessionStorage!=undefined){
try{
sessionStorage.setItem("marketoParams",utmParams);
}
catch(e){
console.log(e);
createSessionCookie("marketoParams",utmParams);
}
}
else{
createSessionCookie("marketoParams",utmParams);
}
}
if(window.sessionStorage!=undefined){
try{
var params=sessionStorage.getItem("marketoParams");
if(params!=null){
updateLinks(params);
}
}
catch(e){
console.log(e);
var params=readCookie("marketoParams");
if(params!=null){
updateLinks(params);
}
}
}
else{
var params=readCookie("marketoParams");
if(params!=null){
updateLinks(params);
}
}
function updateLinks(params){
var links=document.getElementsByTagName("a");
for(var i=0;i<links.length;i++){
var url=links[i].getAttribute("href");
if(url!=null && url.indexOf("https://content.akamai.com")==0){
if(url.indexOf("?")>-1){
if(url.lastIndexOf("utm")<url.lastIndexOf("?")){
links[i].setAttribute("href",url+"&"+params);
}
}
else{
links[i].setAttribute("href",url+"?"+params);
}
}
}
}
function createSessionCookie(name,value) {
var expires = "";
document.cookie = name + "=" + value+"; path=/";
}
function readCookie(name) {
var nameEQ = name + "=";
var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++) {
var c = ca[i];
while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);
if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);
}
return null;
}
})()
</script> 
<script>
document.domain = "akamai.com";
</script>
<div class="addthis_inline_share_toolbox_d42q"></div>
</body>
</html>
<span style="display:none;">XPM</span>
